Customers can track their progress and pay for the watch in 12 24 monthly installments using the healthy and grocery loyalty reward points. The program aims to empower customers to manage their health needs, improve customer engagement and retention. EAW enables scalability by allowing customers to buy a high ticket device or a service e.g. Apple Watch, vacation tickets, Orange Theory membership . Behavioral Challenges is a concept meant to incentive users to engage across our various New Programs and Features on both Web App Platforms and are focused driving greater Digital Engagement in effort to highlight and drive more regular usage of our Digital Services and Products. As part of this next phase, the expectation is to establish a separate Landing Page meant highlight a unique set of Challenges meant to increase User Loyalty while displaying opportunities to Earn and Save additional Rewards and Dollars on future transactions. These additional capabilities and experiences will incentive breadth and depth of engagement for our users in a programmatic way and build on become an extension of existing strategies already part of the B4U Experience. data.title: Weekly Ad Load to Account
data.description: Overview: Currently the Albertson s Digital Weekly Ad DWA is has limited capabilities and only allows interactive Offers and Products featured to be Added to the User s My List . B4U Offers highlighted within the DWA, in some cases link the Weekly Ad Coupon event page or in other cases prompt the user to Print Coupon . In either case the user is still required to subsequently take additional steps to engage, such as Clip all the applicable coupons with the Event or take the Printed coupon into the store to redeem. Confluence Link: https: confluence.safeway.com display CDT Weekly AD B4U Offer Load to Account src contextnavpagetreemode Objective: In an effort to improve the User Experience within the Digital Weekly Ad Web App , the Business would like to add additional functionality to enable to End User to Click Tap featured Digital B4U Offers resulting the offers being added to the User s Account allowing to be Redeemed in a subsequent transaction both in store and online. Feature Requirements: Allow Digital Coupons featured in the Weekly Ad Web App to be Clipped directly to the User s Account Implement Retry protocols to insure a good user experience Avoid duplicate clips that may negatively impact My List experience

data.title: HouseHold Targeting from Neptune
data.description: Enable the coupon feed from Neptune updated with meta data used to target to households based on purchase history within B4U. Household Targeting: CPG S want to target users with offers who have made a purchase on their brands. Targeted customized deals offered by CPG and designed by us. For example: Pepsi comes to ABS and they say they want to target any consumer who bought Pepsi products in the last six months and offer a 1.00 offer to just those consumers. This is where it would be considered a household targeting. We would have to pull the data and then Show that offer to those people who qualified. With Quotient, we shared the data where when a user would sign up logins and API would be called giving information to Quotient on the user but with Neptune we do not share any kind of user information. We ll have to build out how we would target specific individual households.

data.title: B4U Additional Manufactured Coupon Types onto Neptune
data.description: Add the following types of coupons to the Neptune feed for Manufactured Coupons Multi limit must buy Minimum spend basket level Multi limit must buy Can be renamed to multi use, a coupon that can be used multiple times given it parse the condition given Minimum spend basket level for items when they reach the min spend level discount off is applied at the basket level during checkout Multi level Must Buy: This coupon is defined as a cents off two products instead of giving cents off one product. Applicable to the purchase of items from the same product line. For e.g.: two toothpastes. Minimum spend basket level: Can also be termed as partial order discount. Certain CPG S want to give minimum order value discount on their products which will be applied during checkout for that CPG items if the condition of the offer is met.

data.title: B4U Multi redeem MF coupons for Neptune
data.description: This coupon is defined is defined as cents off with a limit of redemptions 1. Example, if a customer wants to redeem this coupon with a limit of 10, they have to purchase 10 times to reach the limit of redemption. Coupon Save 1.00 Off Kingsford Charcoal Save 1.00 per bag of 10lb Kingsford Charcoal. May be redeemed up to 10x on the purchase of 10 bags of charcoal.

data.title: B4U Weekly Ad Add to Cart
data.description: The Digital Weekly AD Add to Cart initiative is meant to allow Digital Weekly Ad Users the ability to add to existing or begin a New Online Order via the Digital Weekly Ad supported by Flipp. This will enable the users to interact with the coupons on the DWA. The objective of this feature is to increase digital engagement by trying to create user dependency on the digital version of the WA than the paper WA. Once we enable this feature, a shopping cart can be enabled on the Ad page, and users can select the items to Add to cart without navigating on different pages. Criteria Examples : Spent, Units or Weight Purchased Purchase Requirements: All Applicable Products or a Subset of UPCs PLUs Features: Display offers in B4U Offer Gallery My List in both Web and App Update User status within Offer POD to show progress Near Real Time Example: Slide Bar or Number Values 2 of 4 or Both Offer POD to show as Available Offer once criteria has been reached. Problem Statement : Today, offers in the B4U Gallery are sorted based on Item you Buy and Items you may Like Buyer vs. Non Buyer and Offer Types Personalized Deals Mfr Coupons Store Coupons . This existing structure limits the Business ability to maximize all the available content at any given time and under of the program Features : HH Level Offer Ranking to influence user engagement in both Web and App of the B4U Offer Galleries Updated Daily at 2 3am EST Business provided Snowflake HH Offer Ranks to be prioritized above pre existing Default Offer Ranks Offers missing from will be Snowflake Offer Ranking Table will appear below Snowflake Ranked Offers Missing HHs to receive Default Offer Rankings Instant Allocation offers will be subject to Snowflake Ranked Offers Clipped Offers will appear after Ranked and UnRanked Offers, as it does today No Change Offer Rankings will be determined based on Region, HH ID, Offer ID, Buyer Flag and Offer Rank Offer Rankings should be consistent between both Web and App, minus any user defined Sorting or Filters being applied Update Offer Gallery for Items you Buy Items you may like to Recommended for U More Savings for U , respectively Offer Rankings from Snowflake will also provide Buyer Flag Attribute Recommended for U should be Buyer Flag 1 More Savings for U should be Buyer Flag 0

data.title: Specialty Programs pet, baby, kids, etc... UMA
data.description: Albertsons banners currently offers various specialty programs, for example Pet, Baby, Kids, and Wine. Some of the programs are fully non digital, while others integrate various digital offers. This initiative aims to weave these programs into the existing loyalty framework to achieve maximum efficiency of internal resources financial, marketing, IT, etc. and effectiveness in terms of customer reach, scale, and profitability. These specialty programs will come to life as perks of the Banner for U program, and as a Member of the program, you can opt in to these themes or categories. For example, the preference center could house Pet information type, name, etc. which could then help determine that the customer has opted in to receiving these specialty offers and journey. The first specialty program is the current Pet offering. Link to Lean Business case: https: confluence.safeway.com display CDT Loyalty Specialty Programs Epic Page

data.title: B4U B4U Coupon Card Redesign
data.description: Overview : Adjust how B4U Coupon Cards are displayed in the end user within the Web Experience and look at potentially adjusting how offer metadata is rendered within the Coupon Cards to take advantage of Higher Quality Images, Offer Type Logos etc... Today, B4U Offers are being picked up from the Digital Asset Management System ADAM as High Res Images, but the Web Pages are down grading those images as they reach the customer in Web. While the image in it s smallest form doesn t highlight the lack of quality, as the image size is increased there is a noticeable difference. In order to implement High Res Images in the Coupon Cards, we need to review the current design in order to take full advantage by displaying larger images, similar to how UMA leverages them today. Goal: Update how our B4U Offer Images are rendering to the end user by reconfiguring how offers display. Insure the highest quality images possible. Review Coupon Card design and increase the size of Product Images at they appears in all Offer Formats on Web and insure a consistent look feel through the various Offer Cards. Impacted Offer Cards For U , My List , PDP , Offer Details Adjust how For U Logos are displayed next to Offer Value on Coupon Cards. Review how Coupons Deals are displayed in Carousals. data.title: Enhanced Customer Content Preferences
data.description: Link to LBC: https: confluence.safeway.com display CDT Enhanced Customer Content Preferences Business Objective: Customers should have the ability to explicitly indicate the types of messaging they want to receive email, push, sms by dietary preference, product category pet care, baby care, etc. or content category Mother s Day, Father s Day, etc. . Success Metrics: Increased email channel engagement metrics within six months of launch. Decreased email opt out rates within six months of launch. Impacted Teams: Web Team, UCA, UX, EDM, COMMS Goals: Create functionality for customers to explicitly indicate their content preferences, such as dietary, product category, or holiday themed content. These content preferences would live separately from communications preferences i.e. Offers Promotions and would be optional to customers to capture incremental data about them. Use Content Preference Data points to target customers for marketing campaigns, journeys, as well as personalize content. Use Cases: Allowing customers to opt out of Mother s Day or Father s Day marketing campaigns. Allowing customers to opt out of Pet Care or Baby Care content in their emails.

data.title: Consolidated MarTech Style Guide for Emails in ACS
data.description: Original Title: Platform Enhancements and Modernization Style Guide Consolidation Description: Because the email template and components created during the Adobe Migration were made according to different UI specifications there are a number of discrepancies and incompatibilities in the AEM components for campaigns. This leads to challenges in trying to use the same components across different campaigns, redundant components, and issues placing components on templates. The disparate style guides from the migrations will now be consolidated into a single, standardized UI specification from ABSCO UX, and the components will undergo remediation to align to these new standard specs. This should help facilitate greater interchangeability of components and resolve some of the css issues, as well as incorporating Accessibility and Darkmode support. Full one pager can be found here: Style Guide Consolidation and Remediation https: confluence.safeway.com display EM Style Guide Consolidation and Remediation Design High Level Plan can be found here: Overall Plan https: confluence.safeway.com display PER Overall Plan Development and Rollout Plan can be found here: DEV and Rollout approach for style guide changes https: confluence.safeway.com display PER SPIKE 3A DEV and Rollout approach for style guide changes Success Criteria KPI: Emails use the standard width of 622px Emails have a more consistent look and feel, and greater interchangeability across campaigns Mkt Ops can modify create campaigns in AEM with greater ease and less dependency on IT, leader to faster turnaround times Sizing estimates for proposed BAU email campaigns goes down as authoring complexity becomes more simplified

data.title: Multivariate Testing and Subject Line and Content Optimization

This tool needs to be accessible to our content and marketing teams. We can monitor click rates on our emails to measure the impact performance of the tool s use. This request comes from Marketing ops Hoda Sheidaei . Goals: Enable Multivariate testing for campaigns in ACS Reduce dependency on Allocation team to make changes to allocation file in order to run testing Testing to be enabled for : subject line content friendly from name Winner to be determined based on the test results and accordingly, variation to be sent out to remaining audience on the same day

data.description: Digital Marketing team is working with partners to drive ecommerce shopper traffic to banner website and mobile apps. An important ask to help complete meaningful customer engagement is driving them to load their cart with recipe ingredients from a 3rd party site. Shopper Experience.JPG width 475,height 285 Shopper experience flow with Guest Cart: Shopper browses the recipe on a 3rd party site Shopper clicks on CTA powered by Chicory to shop for the ingredients in the recipe. Chicory based on location of the shopper recommends Grocery stores to choose from. Shopper selects the grocery store brand of choice. Shopper is redirected to the grocers website and cart is loaded with ingredients. Shopper continues to browse or shop on the grocer s website. Shopper experience flow with Single Sign on option: Shopper Exp SSO login.JPG width 817,height 277 Shopper browses the recipe on a 3rd party site Shopper clicks on CTA powered by Chicory to shop for the ingredients in the recipe. Chicory based on location of the shopper recommends Grocery stores to choose from. Shopper selects the grocery store brand of choice. Shopper is presented option to login to Grocer s site. On successful login authorization Shopper is redirected to the grocers website and cart is loaded with ingredients. Shopper continues to browse or shop on the grocer s website. Technology requirements from Chicory Chicory team needs access to following api s to power the above shopping experience to work across 3rd party sites and ACI banners Add to cart API Product Search API SSO Api to enable shopper to sign in. Banner and store list with available fulfillment options by zipcode.

data.title: Quick Path to Purchase
data.description: Digital Marketing is working with partners e.g., Basketful to attract shoppers who are too busy and distracted for long legacy paths to purchase. SmartCommerce s Click2Cart creates a quick path to purchase from any digital touchpoint into your online retail cart. We are creating an omnishopping revolution by converting the 17 minutes a day of active shopping into anytime, anyplace passive shopping. Saves customers the time of adding to cart on their own. Click2Cart Solution: Click2Cart option will appear in ads, emails, videos, social media, brand websites, mobile, or recipe platforms Click Add to Cart or Buy Online Select your Zip Code Select your favorite store based on close proximity Albertsons Adds into online Albertsons retail cart Requirements: How to send products to your carts and know that they arrived. To know what products you have in stock, and at what price via API, feed . This ensures we don t miss opportunities to present your offers to consumers. Why Sell through Data is Recommended Sell through data increases traffic, as brands are more likely to promote retailers that provide this data than those that don t. It also helps improve brand engagements, which in turn drives more sales to you. The Technology Master Optimization Engine MOE : MOE creates and maintains a complicated network of connections between products and retailers using sophisticated data analytics This entails repeatedly mapping and re mapping multi variable layered ontological rules across 10 s of millions of Product Offer pairs, using: layered machine learning scripts advanced automated product recognition, using multi variable algorithms logistic regression modeling Intelligent product price and availability interpolation This gives us a unique ability to obtain, unify, optimize, and keep the data constantly updated and drives our carting applications, dynamic product substitution, personalized shopper UIs, etc.

data.title: ACS Campaigns Components Ongoing Support
data.description: Background: This DIG EPIC comprises any and all assorted or one off net new AEM component requests, enhancements, or remediation. All components as part of this initiative are intended for general ACS campaign use, across all campaigns. Note: If a larger initiative DIG EPIC necessitates new components as part of its delivery, any AEM component related efforts that specifically applies to it will be grouped within that DIG EPIC. Objective: This DIG EPIC will act as a evolving list of net new components or major component remediation efforts, and its features can be used for prioritization or dependency mapping as needed. Success Criteria: AEM components made in these features will be built to consolidated style guide UI specifications, including responsive, Darkmode, and Accessibility guidelines AEM components will be interchangeable between campaigns, unless otherwise stated

data.title: Implement ACS push notification for Fuel Rewards apps
data.description: The epic contains stories to implement ACS Push for Fuel Rewards apps. The Fuel Rewards apps were using Localytics to send transactional push notification. There were three main push messages: Welcome message Transaction status. The pumps send fueling status to our backend, which then triggers push messages. Digital receipt The push notifications stopped at end of May 2022 when our contract with Localtyics terminated. While the information above are available in the app, we still want to re establish Push to have a better user experience. This epic will implement ACS Push notification for the 5 Fuel Rewards apps. The effort will involve the following teams: Martech MOA Martech Comms Fuel Rewards mobile team Analytics Fuel Rewards Banners Safeway Albertsons Randalls Tom Thumb Vons
